topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af0ccf636872798a7a0800#post_54af0ccf636872798a7a0800
[bq="uc9"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af09c66368724ca9073200#post_54af09c66368724ca9073200
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af057063687233bd791700#post_54af057063687233bd791700
Honestly I'm done with this Drama completely.

Its gotten out of hand, and I mean WAY out of hand. And hearing what happened to 8chan It just disgusted me so bad. Like, That shit is just gross.

Like, Jesus Christ. What the shit is even going on anymore? [/bq]
Honestly my tolerance for this drama is wearing thin myself and to be 100% honest I both want those responsible to continue to shoot themselves in the foot and for them to cut their losses and run.  On the one hand if they continue then chances are a lot of them are going to be outted and it's going to be harder for them to pull this shit; on the other hand my sanity wants it to stop already.  It's gotten to the point where even trolls are stopping trying to have fun with it cause they are looking at what is going on and they just feel sick.  Even people on their side are looking at the stuff their side is doing and they're feeling sick.

I know what is going on and trust me dude; I can understand why so many people are calling it quits cause we have officially reached the point at which this is probably one of the sickest shits on the internet currently.  One person that I knew and now only know as a acquaintance I told him what was his side was doing and gave him the articles written on it and the chat logs; after reading everything and realizing what was going on he gave me a split second "I have to go throw up" and he proceeded to throw up the entire of his contents of his stomach into the garbage can.

You know drama has officially gotten out of hand when people are physically throwing up at how disgusting people are acting.



I have a feeling the internet is going to have a new internet rule:
Rule 0: don't mess with cats.
Rule 0-A: don't be a sick fuck.[/bq]
This exactly! I'm focusing on more positive stuff this year cuz Its 2015 and this shit is STILL going and GETTING WORSE.

Its like everytime you think its over some one lights the fire back up with enough gasoline to fuel up the entire Airforce for another 89 years!

Or better yet enough funds to _actually build a working EVA_.

Its awwwwful.

Tl:dr; the ranks of SJW turns out are filled with actual pedos and dog fuckers.  I'm not talking about hentai either; I'm talking about the actual real life acts of this.

After Dan Olsen got outted they've over the past two weeks have shifted from "gamergate is a misogynistic movement" to "society needs to stop persecuting child predators".  It's being investigated into, but even though I have a metaphorical rock hard stomach even I'm feeling physically sick cause of what is getting turned up.

At this point I'm just going to take a break off from any and all drama cause at this point my tolerance for sick fucks is at 0 cause the shit that is going down is just sick.  I'm just done with this drama for now; I need a break cause I can't even believe this shit anymore.
